trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Glen Ellyn
There were no other sightings in Glen Ellyn on or around July 18th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe had just parked our car and let the kids out to go inside when my son looked up and said what is that dad? I looked up and saw what looked like a white dot moving pretty fast that changed into a glowing bag...like a luminaire thing but with fire melting off of it... I asked my wife what the heck she thought it was and she had no answer. It made no noise at all. I have no idea how high it was because it was dark and really had no reference for it...it travelled from the northwest to the southeast. I grabbed a few pictures with my blackberry and then after about 20 seconds it just dissappeared. The pictures are crappy and only show a white dot and then a reddish glowing dot... I was kind of freaked out because I have never seen such a strange object. My son was freaked out for a day or 2 . Its weird but when I go to view the picture details it shows that the pictures are from different dates and times... they were all taken within seconds of one another
Summary: looked like fire melting out of a paper bag
